feature.label: DFTools Developper Requirements (Meta Feature)
feature.description: This feature embeds all required Eclipse plugins for developping DFTools. That includes XTend, GEF, EMF, Graphiti (Eclipse) Plus SDKs, along with Checkstyle integration for Eclipse, Maven integration for Eclipse (and appropriate extension), and aslo Graphiti (IETR) and third party libraries.
